overview: Rasyah's family decided to move again and this time they went to Makassar. Rasyah's father's job makes them have to change places frequently. This makes it difficult for Rasyah to get and makes Rasyah feel insecure. However, something was different when they arrived in Makassar. Rasyah got one very good friend. The dilemma begins when Rasyah knows that soon she will leave her best friend.
title: Rasyah The Wonder Kid
